content.text:
Turns out that Dat URLs work, but the hash string URI needs to be encapsulated in arrows so the Markdown renderer linkifies it:

```md
<dat://17b98de88d1979f9a1559f8a709c446ce85f17c3524837207171bd4cd685a0a4>
```

<dat://17b98de88d1979f9a1559f8a709c446ce85f17c3524837207171bd4cd685a0a4>
